skillTree.localised_description: Twin cleavers dripping with blood and carved with brass-forged runes, these weapons amplify Terrog's already staggering destructive power. With each kill, the blades siphon the essence of the slain, adding it to Terrog's swelling bloodlust and reinforcing his barbaric vitality.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.localised_description: Forged deep in the Brass Citadel itself and gifted to Terrog Throatsplitter by a Daemon Smith of Khorne, the Brass Maw is a grotesque suit of Chaos-forged plate. Its chestpiece is adorned with a demonic visage that glares hungrily at all who oppose its wearer. The “mouth” of the armor is no mere decoration but an accursed maw, gnashing with jagged brass teeth that consume the souls and gore of the slain, feeding Terrog's unnatural resilience and rage. Inscribed with symbols of Khorne, the armor thrums with brutal energy, transforming Terrog into a relentless juggernaut.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Each victory reinvigorates Khorne's champions to seek more bloodshed.

effects.description: Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after winning a battle
Replenishes 10% campaign movement range after razing a settlement
Replenishes 30% campaign movement range after winning a battle
Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after razing a settlement

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Even the most stalwart defenders of order falter at the sight of Terrog, their spirits crushed by his inhuman strength and unrelenting bloodlust. His mere presence robs his foes of their defensive resolve, turning once-disciplined troops into terrified prey.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: When Terrog charges into a pack of enemies, few survive to tell the tale. His impacts are like avalanches of flesh and steel, leaving gory breaches for his bloodied followers to exploit.
With every bone-shattering charge, Terrog sends adrenaline surging through his blood. His momentum energizes both his body and his warriors, invigorating their movements.
Encased in symbols of Khorne's protection, Terrog's armor provides him great resistance to enemy magic. His tireless frenzy in battle inspires dread as he grows more unrelenting the longer he fights.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: As Terrog's warband grows, so does his immense physicality, becoming almost immovable in the field of battle. The sheer momentum of his forces mirrors his increasing mass and unyielding hunger for devastation.
A berserk fury consumes Terrog in prolonged combat, his movements growing more frantic, his strikes impossibly vicious. His frenzy inspires his allies, spurring them into unrelenting savagery.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: No enemy is immovable when in the path of a furious Ogre's charge.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
This Ogre's greed shall never be sated, for his stomach is as endless as his hunger.
A truly sturdy armour is needed to hold such an overflowing gut in place.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
If the enormous size of this Ogre doesn't incite terror, his bloody, malevolent smile surely will.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

Melee attack: +4 for all non-Daemonic Infantry units

skillTree.localised_description: The Daemons of Chaos bay for blood, spurred on by a chorus of agonised screams.

skillTree.localised_description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

skillTree.localised_description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units

Melee defence: +8 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

Weapon strength: +4% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units

Weapon strength: +6% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units

skillTree.localised_description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

Ammunition: +10% for all non-Daemonic Missile Cavalry and Artillery units

Ammunition: +15% for all non-Daemonic Missile Cavalry and Artillery units

skillTree.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 20% for all Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for all Cavalry, Chariot and Flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all Cavalry, Chariot and Flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all Cavalry, Chariot and Flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all war beasts, monstrous, and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 5% for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all Missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for all Missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all Missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.
Every skull taken in the Blood God's honour proves this one's loyalty to the Skull Throne.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Visions cloud the mind, prophesising the arrival of the enemy and uncovering every shadow in which they lurk.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: This Khornate Lord's well of eternal rage never runs dry, nor does the ceaseless influx of warriors eager to serve under his command.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +250 metres without incurring any time penalty
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +600 metres without incurring any time penalty
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: There is no stopping this one's slaughter, for they are driven by the unquenchable lust for battle.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Daemons Reforged: +3% chance for destroyed Daemonic units to be restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

Daemons Reforged: +6% chance for destroyed Daemonic units to be restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

Daemons Reforged: +10% chance for destroyed Daemonic units to be restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is unable to activate abilities or cast spells.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.
Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

items.colour_text: Forged deep in the Brass Citadel itself and gifted to Terrog Throatsplitter by a Daemon Smith of Khorne, the Brass Maw is a grotesque suit of Chaos-forged plate. Its chestpiece is adorned with a demonic visage that glares hungrily at all who oppose its wearer. The “mouth” of the armor is no mere decoration but an accursed maw, gnashing with jagged brass teeth that consume the souls and gore of the slain, feeding Terrog's unnatural resilience and rage. Inscribed with symbols of Khorne, the armor thrums with brutal energy, transforming Terrog into a relentless juggernaut.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

items.colour_text: Twin cleavers dripping with blood and carved with brass-forged runes, these weapons amplify Terrog's already staggering destructive power. With each kill, the blades siphon the essence of the slain, adding it to Terrog's swelling bloodlust and reinforcing his barbaric vitality.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Terrog wades into battle as a living avatar of Khorne, inspiring terror and loyalty in equal measure. Opponents who don't flee are trampled or carved to pieces by his inexorable mass. Victory brings not respite but greater zeal for the endless carnage ahead, for Terrog marches only for blood, slaughter, and the favor of the Blood God.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
